.. _chat:

Chat Web Application
====================

Overview
--------

The chat web application provides real-time communication capabilities between users. It allows users to create chat rooms, join existing ones, and exchange messages with other users.

Contents
--------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   consumers

Chat Views
----------

This section provides documentation for the views within the chat app.

   :members:
   :show-inheritance:
